items.sentence: Tom is going to apply for a job with a computer company.
Tom is looking for a suitable place to hold the meeting.
Tom is looking for somebody to teach French to his kids.
I\'m helping Tom move some of his things this afternoon.
I\'ve been trying to figure out where Tom hid the money.
Tom still comes to the hospital every day to visit Mary.
Tom stopped doing his homework and turned off the light.
Tom thinks raising the minimum wage would be a bad idea.
When do you expect to have your Christmas shopping done?
Tom checked his mailbox to see if he\'d gotten any mail.
